pages.text: The $(item)Blessed Trees$() stopped growing 300 years ago outside of this simulated plane, their origin is unknown because they were here before we ever set our feet on this dimension.$(br2)The trunk of the tree is filled with some sort of $(item)Blood$() so we never could turn it into planks.

pages.title: Location and Uses
pages.text: They only grow in the $(item)Blessed Plains$() biome.$(br2)Until you progress into later $(item)Simulations$() this is not a renewable resource.$(br2)For now you can use a $(l:)Squeezer$() to press the Blood out of the logs.
